titles: Posita dubitatione cartesiana certa veritatis norma habèri non potest
author: Hare, Francis, 1671-1740.
notes: In two columns. The right hand column headed: Libertas arbitrii soli substantiæ immeteriali competit.
At foot of page: Jul. 6. 1697. In die comit. resp. in Philosoph. Fr. Hare A.M. Coll. Regal. Soc.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library, London, England.
